```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
debt <- read_excel("Makroøkonomisk projekt.xlsx", sheet = "Debt ")
na.omit(debt)
debt 
```

```{r}
date01 <- debt$Date...2
netlending <- debt$`Percent of GDP...3`
ggplot(debt, aes(x = date01, y = netlending)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  labs(
       x = "År",
       y = "Procent af BNP") +
  theme_minimal() + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + 
  geom_abline(aes(intercept=0, slope=0))
```

```{r}
date02 <- debt$Date...8
grossdebt <- debt$`Percent of GDP...9`
ggplot(debt, aes(x = date02, y = grossdebt)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  labs(
       x = "År",
       y = "Procent af BNP") +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
date1 <- debt$Date...5
projectionbudget1 <- debt$`Percent of GDP...6`
date2 <- debt$Date...11
projection2 <- debt$`Percent of GDP...12`
ggplot(debt, aes(x = date1, y = projectionbudget1)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  labs(
       x = "År",
       y = "Procent af BNP") +
  theme_minimal()
ggplot(debt, aes(x = date2, y = projection2)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  labs(
       x = "År",
       y = "Procent af BNP") +
  theme_minimal()
```
